title: Update navbar link text from 'top 10' to 'Standings'

requirements.summary: Change the navigation link text from 'top 10' to 'Standings' in the Navigation component
acceptanceCriteria: The link still navigates to the same page (Top10.tsx)
The text change is visible in both desktop and mobile navigation views

file_operations.description: Update the navigation link text from 'top 10' to 'Standings' in both the desktop navigation menu and the mobile hamburger menu. Ensure the link still points to the /top10 route while displaying the new text 'Standings'.
